attributes.title: made my toes fall off😢
attributes.review: you guys might think i’m joking, but no. once i downloaded this app, all five of my toes on my right foot just fell off. i tried gluing them back on but it obviously didn’t work because if it did i wouldn’t be writing this review. just stay safe guys. i wouldn’t want you guys losing your toes too. it’s not worth it.

attributes.title: THIS APP IS DOO DOO!!!
attributes.review:
It caused a death!!😭😭😭
My great great great great grandma is a fan of are prickly ugly orange bald headed president so she downloaded the app i woke up to her yelling “GET AWAY!!!” I ran to her and theses rat were attacking her chanting “VOTE FOR TRUMP” I was gonna help her but one of the rats chased me!! THIS APP IS DOO DOO!!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD IF U DONT WANT A PACK OF RATS ATTACK U!!,

attributes.title: I have been killed
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app because I was wondering about the news but then I SAW S ORANGE WITH A YELLOW WEAVE AND HE SAID “NOOB.” Then pushed me off the grand canon then at the end there was dance monkey on repeat and now I’m writing this review in heaven

attributes.title: horrible app
attributes.review: IT TOOK 2 WEEKS TO DOWNLOAD DO NOT DOWNLOAD! my phone kept crashing when it finally downloaded and i’m suspicious of it! i have a feeling i might get a virus from the app🙄🙄🙄

attributes.title: I think not you white supremist😌😙✨
attributes.review: Imagine wanting a racist white supremist as your president that has a crush on little kids and his own daughter? couldn’t be me😘😝🤡🙈✨

attributes.title: WARNING DO NOT DOWNLOAD 😤
attributes.review: As soon as I got this app and I opened the application my phone started to glitch like crazy and when I went to the Apple store to get it fix they said this app caused it. I REPEAT DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP 😡

attributes.title: Just Awful 🧚🏻‍♀️✨
attributes.review: This took hours to download, and kept crashing each time I opened it!

attributes.title: Very poor quality
attributes.review: Am I talking about the app or the person or both? I guess we’ll never know...

attributes.title: Racist
attributes.review: This app is insane. Once I downloaded and opening it it asked me my opinion about African Americas being allowed to vote!! Disgusting. Does Trump really want to try to stop BIPOC people from voting!?!?

attributes.title: dissapointed 😔
attributes.review: I just wanted to check in on the “greatest” president of all time but as soon as i opened the app i broke out in horrible rashes!! I guess i’m allergic to misogynists/sexists/racists/terrible people 🙅‍♀️
